title: Doktorandica
author: Doktorandica
content: Hi there!I'm Phd student and my topic is taxation of cryptocurrencies. During this or next week I will make a poll about taxation in different EU and no-EU countries so I was wondering will you be so kind to answer as honest as you can so that I can finish my work.Of course after I receive all the answers I will inform you about the results.But first of all my question is will I have enough answers to proceed with my work? Thank you in advance for your help and pre-poll answers

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: What is the nature of the questions you are looking for and does it require specific experience, personal information, additional details or anything that can help determine the nature of these questions.If you add more details, it will help narrow your list.But in general, the members here are friendly and will help you, you may not find many responses here (because the majority do not neglect this board), but try not to ask for personal information.
